name: getting-started
description: The repository for the Fabric Composer Getting Started application

scripts.test: mocha --recursive && npm run bootstrapAssets && npm run listAssets && npm run submitTransaction
scripts.submitTransaction: node cli.js landregistry submit && node cli.js landregistry list
scripts.deployNetwork: composer archive create -m digitalproperty-network --archiveFile digitalPropertyNetwork.zip && composer network deploy --archiveFile digitalPropertyNetwork.zip  --enrollId WebAppAdmin --enrollSecret DJY27pEnl16d && composer network list -n digitalproperty-network --enrollId WebAppAdmin --enrollSecret DJY27pEnl16d

author: Author
